fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Exactly one Agent Head role and at least one other Agent will always spawn.
- Each Agent is assigned two uncommon "codewords" at the start of the game.
- Agents know other Agents' roles and codewords, but not their names.
- No factional chat
- Factional kill 
- If multiple Agents try to use the factional kill, all but the highest player on the hierarchy will fail and be told that another Agent used it. 
- Hierarchy: Head > Killing > Sabotage > Support > Communication. Lower post numbers take priority in event of a tie.
- When attempting to use the factional kill, Agents may submit a secondary replacement action that they will take if a higher priority Agent uses the factional kill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate everyone who cannot be subverted by the Agents.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate everyone who cannot be subverted by the Agents.
